channel.title: Comments on: What to do when NOT hiking the Great Wall

item.title: By: awanda
item.dc:creator: awanda
item.description: The kitty tee is a cute little tee. Sounds like a day of rest was just what you needed. Good for you for taking care of yourself. You guys have been moving at a pretty frenetic pace.
item.content:encoded: The kitty tee is a cute little tee. Sounds like a day of rest was just what you needed. Good for you for taking care of yourself. You guys have been moving at a pretty frenetic pace.
